title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Mar 18 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Mar 18 2022
description:
Buck hosts solo while busy Clay is in Las Vegas "doing some sports stuff" and Buck says probably showing off his considerable Vegas-style skills. Live not by lies: NCAA women's swim champ Lia Thomas is a man. Buck: "What they are really flirting with here is the destruction of women's sports." Trump, "who has a habit of saying things that turn out to be almost prophetic," was right about the media and Hunter's laptop. Pelosi and Schwarzenegger spout Ukraine silliness. Schwarzenegger's 9-minute pro-Ukrainian video was degraded, Buck said, when he called January 6 an "insurrection" instead of a riot, to show his loyalty to liberals. Buck takes calls from fired-up listeners.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
